    • loginButtonHandler

      public static int loginButtonHandler(javafx.scene.control.TextField usernameField, javafx.scene.control.PasswordField passwordField, javafx.scene.control.Alert alert)
      This function returns a UserID integer for use in queries later.
      Parameters:
      usernameField - this is supplied via the userNameField TextField
      passwordField - this is supplied via the passwordField PasswordField
      alert - this is supplied so that we can return the appropriate error message
      Returns:
      UserID integer

    • getScheduleByTime

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Schedule> getScheduleByTime(int userID, String queryType) throws SQLException, ParseException
      getScheduleByTime was my favorite function to write. In many ways, it is the culmination of my Java learning.
      Parameters:
      userID - Integer of user for whom a Schedule is needed
      queryType - String to specify what grouping of time is needed
      Returns:
      ObservableList scheduleList based upon the queryType
      Throws:
      SQLException - on SQL error
      ParseException - on parsing Dates

    • addAppt

      public static void addAppt(Integer userID, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Schedule> scheduleTable) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Function to add an Appointment. LAMBDA EXPRESSION in cancelBtn.setOnAction(): This lambda expression is very simple and allows me to immediately close my Stage on the cancelBtn being clicked, rather than having to create an EventHandler.
      Parameters:
      userID - Integer ID of user who is adding Appt
      scheduleTable - TableView scheduleTable for updating
      Throws:
      SQLException - on SQL error
      ParseException - on parsing Dates

    • delAppt

      public static void delAppt(Integer userID, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Schedule> schedTable, Schedule selectedAppt) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Function to delete an Appointment
      Parameters:
      userID - Integer ID of user who is deleting Appointment
      schedTable - TableView schedTable for updating
      selectedAppt - Schedule selectedAppt from the selected item on the TableView
      Throws:
      SQLException - on SQL error
      ParseException - on parsing Dates

    • modAppt

      public static void modAppt(Integer userID, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Schedule> scheduleTable, Schedule selectedAppt) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Function to modify an Appointment LAMBDA EXPRESSION in dateField.setOnAction(): I heavily utilize lambdas in my code, but this is a clear and succinct example of how useful they are. Rather than creating an EventHandler, I can simply use a lambda to immediately set my value on the setOnAction listener.
      Parameters:
      userID - Integer ID of User who is modifying Appointment
      scheduleTable - TableView scheduleTable for updating
      selectedAppt - Schedule selectedAppt from selected item on TableView
      Throws:
      SQLException - on SQL error
      ParseException - on parsing Dates

    • modApptTime

      public static void modApptTime(Integer userID, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Schedule> scheduleTable, Schedule selectedAppt) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Function to modify only the time of an Appt
      Parameters:
      userID - Integer ID of User modifying Appt
      scheduleTable - TableView scheduleTable for updating
      selectedAppt - Schedule selectedAppt from object selected on TableView
      Throws:
      SQLException - on SQL error
      ParseException - on parsing Dates
